This site tracks the duration of 2023 FBS college football games. It only includes information for games between two FBS teams and only for the 2023 season. 

The goal is to track the duration and surface the data to analyze if there are any changes in game duration due to recent rule changes. 

### Data 

The data used on this site is provided by [SportsSource Analytics](http://sportsourceanalytics.com/) You can find similar data by purchasing one of the [data packages](http://sportsourceanalytics.com/data.html).
<br>
The data is often corroborated using [cfbfastR](https://cfbfastr.sportsdataverse.org/index.html) and [stats.ncaa.org](https://stats.ncaa.org/). 
<br>
The duration is listed in minutes. The drives include "garbage time" drives, and does not filter out any data.
